project: moviePal - enrich your movie list wisely
description: An App to help ease our daily stress of picking a perfect Movie. Allows you to search for Movies, maintain a single watchlist, rate Movies, show real time availability at streaming services and most importantly rating by your family and friends.
technologies: React hooks, React-bootstrap, Node.js, Express, Mongo, jsonwebtoken

description: One stop e-store for all your Corona fasion needs
technologies: Node, express server, Seqelize & MySQL, 3 Models - User, Order, Products, 16 API's/Routes, Heroku, MVC Architecture, express handlebars, bcrypt, eslint, prettier

description: Help tourists explore new places who are not sure where to go next.
technologies: JQuery, Bulma CSS Framework, Moment, Fontawesome Leaflet & Mapbox API for Map Accuweather API TicketMaster API for events

description: The application helps a user to able to view ABC Companies entire directory at once, able to sort and  filter by name.
technologies: React, Bootstrap, React Bootstrap Table, Axios, Randomuser API to fetch 200 users with images.

description: Webbased Application to allow users to search weather conditions and future outlook for multiple cities. The data is stored in localstorage for last 5 searches. User can search any new location and get current and 5 day forecast.
technologies: Bootstrap, JQuery Ajax, Open Weather API, local storage.

description: Tracking workout helps users reach their fitness goals. Workout application will help to track daily workouts. The application allows to log multiple excercises in a workout on a given day.
technologies: Node, Express, Mongo database, Mongoose, Heroku
